akn:section.akn:heading: Authority to appoint commissioners; powers of authorities

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 912. Authority to appoint commissioners; powers of authorities The Legislature of Puerto Rico may provide for the appointment and terms of the commissioners of such authorities, and for the powers of such authorities, except that such authorities shall be given no power of taxation, and may authorize the commissioners of such authorities to fix the salaries of employees. (June 25, 1938, ch. 703, § 2, 52 Stat. 1203.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was not enacted as part of the Puerto Rican Federal Relations Act which comprises this chapter.
